PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-02082024-03-25NR
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of KIM KIERANS of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to serve as Vice-Chairperson of the Independent Advisory Board on Eligibility for Journalism Tax Measures, to hold office during pleasure for a term of six months, on a part-time basis, effective March 25, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of KIM KIERANS of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Revenue, to serve as Vice-Chairperson of the Independent Advisory Board on Eligibility for Journalism Tax Measures, to hold office during pleasure for a term of six months, on a part-time basis, effective March 25, 2024.
